I have difficulties with adding 3rd attachment (stack) node to my part. It breaks behaviour of 1st and 2nd node.

This works fine:

node_stack_top = 0, 0, 2.1, 0, 0, 1, 2

node_stack_bottom = 0, 0, -2.1, 0, 0, 1, 2

However this not:

node_stack_top = 0, 0, 2.1, 0, 0, 1, 2

node_stack_bottom = 0, 0, -2.1, 0, 0, 1, 2

node_stack_side = 0, 0.21, 0, 0, 1, 0, 1

node_stack_side works as expected, but top and bottom node cannot be attached to other part (part remains red instead of green). However you can attach other parts to top and bottom node just fine (if you start constructing with the part with those stack nodes).

Am I doing something wrong?
Move the side node definition to the top of that list. Only the last two nodes will be available to attach to other things and only if they are in line with eachother. It's a bug.
